item.description:
Maironis Park, Shrewsbury, MA
Friday, August 27 ~~
7 - 11pm.

Be a part of some special performances on August 27th at Maironis Park, sponsored by ABL Dance.

All profits from the event go towards dance scholarships for youth with the Department of Social Services.


Hot/Cold Buffet, General Dancing &
"Dance to Live" Show.

$30 advanced tickets by Aug 14 or
$35 general admission at the door.

"Dance to Live" Show

Performers:
ABL Adult Formation Team - Am. Rumba
ABL Teen Formation Team - Am. Cha Cha
Hanso & Caroline - Internat'l Paso Doble
Kato & Ann - American Bolero
Hillary & Justin - Theatre Arts
Steele & Rebecca - West Coast Swing
Trish & Michael - American Viennese Waltz
Diane & Rob - Hustle
Kato & Miriam - American Viennese Waltz
Trish & Richard - International Foxtrot
Ross & Cate - Jive
Hanso & Rebecca - American Bolero
Trish & Peter - West Coast Swing
Ross & Christine - Cha Cha
Hillary's Diva Line Dancing Team

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: "Dance to Live" Memorial Benefit Remembering Steve Montuori
